findings.title: Token minting
findings.description: Users with the MINTER_ROLE role can mint more tokens than stated in tokenomics.

findings.title: Pausing of all the token transfers
findings.description: Users with the PAUSER_ROLE role can pause all the token transfers anytime. Pausing functionality should be limited by clear contract rules.

findings.title: No caller verification in the initialization function
findings.description: There is no restriction that only the owner can call the initialization function.
